title: fuck you riot
body:
Game 1
Pre-Game
Nerf Velkozby: dont ban yas
Nerf Velkozby: bro
Nerf Velkozby: wtf
Nerf Velkozby: i told you not to ban yasuo
Nerf Velkozby: fml
Nerf Velkozby: no
Nerf Velkozby: i was gonna go yasuo if akali got banned
Nerf Velkozby: i wanted to see who i was aginst top
In-Game
Nerf Velkozby: youtube rewind 2018
Nerf Velkozby: but its my first time akali...
Nerf Velkozby: i could go tryhard like you
Nerf Velkozby: go yasuo
Nerf Velkozby: reported for toxic
Nerf Velkozby: so were all reporting lee for toxic right?
Nerf Velkozby: it only took you being fed
Nerf Velkozby: so were reporting lee right?
Nerf Velkozby: i would but i dont know anyone in iron
Nerf Velkozby: nah
Nerf Velkozby: youre the reason they added irom
Nerf Velkozby: iron
Nerf Velkozby: im not raging im giving up on humanity because youre flexing on people wanting to try something new in normals
Nerf Velkozby: "noob"
Nerf Velkozby: "give me a challenge"
Nerf Velkozby: "please"
Nerf Velkozby: in normals\
Nerf Velkozby: you do realize harrassment is bannable
Nerf Velkozby: enjoy ban
Nerf Velkozby: you literally called me a noob
Nerf Velkozby: im not offended
Nerf Velkozby: im just reporting to get you banned
Nerf Velkozby: lets report lee
Nerf Velkozby: sorry guys
Nerf Velkozby: first time akali
Nerf Velkozby: we lost..
Nerf Velkozby: bro
Nerf Velkozby: lee is fed
Nerf Velkozby: im level 9
Nerf Velkozby: yeah but hes 15 kills
Nerf Velkozby: and he counters you
Nerf Velkozby: hey yio
Nerf Velkozby: lee
Nerf Velkozby: why dont you fight twitch
Nerf Velkozby: see
Nerf Velkozby: youre fed
Nerf Velkozby: no im new
Nerf Velkozby: this guys ego
Nerf Velkozby: is the reason this game is dyying
Nerf Velkozby: cant tell whats sadder
Nerf Velkozby: lee is insulting a 15 year old as probably an adult. or hes bragging about killing someone new on normals
Nerf Velkozby: rep lee
Post-Game
Nerf Velkozby: that guy
Nerf Velkozby: is the definition of sad
Nerf Velkozby: bragging about someone playing a hard champ
Nerf Velkozby: fk me
Nerf Velkozby: this game is dying

replies.body: {{champion:267}} Wow, high quality necro here. Gunna lock it up :^)

> Nerf Velkozby: dont ban yas
> Nerf Velkozby: bro
> Nerf Velkozby: wtf
> Nerf Velkozby: i told you not to ban yasuo

The meme is alive.

Anyway, you spent all game flaming lee. Using relatively polite words does not prevent flaming from being flaming.
Repeatedly asking for reports, calling people sad, general negativity all throughout the game as well as Pre and Post game.

whats the point of insulting Riot while appealing a ban?

wouldn't that make yalls lives harder?
Not looking for appeal. Just showing the report system is shit and so is the playerbase

It's not shit and neither is the player-base.  

I play with a lot of really chill individuals every day.
Yeah but every game there is either a noob or a fucking troll messing everything for me

A noob by who's standards? Yours?  What gives you the right to tell them they're noob?  

Also, you know, I've noticed, if you have a tendency towards toxic/griefing behavior, you're gonna bring that out in other players as well, especially if you're directing it towards them.
A noob player as in a cait who takes kleptomancy and feeds ashe

If you are in an MMR where you are being placed with people who (by your standards) play so poorly, then that says something about your own skill level.   Maybe your mechanically skilled but your ability to be a functional team member is so deficient that you're losing games you should be winning.  That is, if you think you're so much better than them but can't figure out why your MMR is where it's at.

>Just ~~showing~~ trying to show the report system is shit and so is the playerbase

FTFY. I'll accept that an attempt was made but your chat logs and both your threads show the opposite.

> [{quoted}](name=Nerf Velkozby,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=HWkiFpZ4,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2018-12-16T07:52:10.658+0000)
>
> Not looking for appeal. Just showing the report system is shit and so is the playerbase

You're kinda prooving otherwise.
Deserved punishment
Don't worry, they probably weren't offensee by what you said. They just reportes you to see you banned. Just like what you did.
you asked others to report someone

[Nerf Velkozby: enjoy ban]

How Ironic

See this is the problem with the reporting system.. people use it as a tool to fuck with people they dont like. They dont even care that theyre being flamed, they just know they can get people banned if they have enough people on their side.

Here you see a guy who was probably being flamed first which is another problem with the reviewing. You only see what HE said.. nothing that the "Lee" guy or anybody said to him. Which was most likely tilting.

With that said he tilted and went off talking a bunch of shit himself. Yea dude you said enough to get chat restricted at least, like I have done myself many times. But the problem is that the system is pro-mob, as in if enough people come together to click that report on you, it doesnt matter if they were a premade and they incited you all game until u finally exploded. You're the only one getting the penalty because its all run by an automated bot. (no matter what the riot reps and goons say, the bot runs the show and the real riot rep that reviews it, IF you decide to challenge it, only sees what you wrote and could give two fucks about what else was said in the chat.)

Its like being teased on the street by a couple of vandals and then when u finally decide to knock one of them out, you're the bad guy.

ps. Asking people to repeatedly "report that guy" usually will get people to want to report you. Unless the dude ure talking about is clearly an Ahoe.

Legit, it doesn't matter what the other person said to instigate the OP flaming.  They're not the ones under review in this particular instance, the OP is.  If the OP and/or anyone else reported the Lee, he'll be getting reviewed as well and if he's on his final warning as the OP was, he'll get perma-banned too.  

And I disagree with your example given.  The vandals are breaking the law, but knocking one of them out is assault, which is still breaking the law.  Two wrongs don't make a right.  We've all heard that before.  

It doesn't matter who "struck" first, striking is reportable, and if you've already been given warnings, you should just mute and move on.  

Also, banning a champion that a player is hovering is not griefing, unless they clearly state it in an obvious way.  As has been said many times here, Bans > Picks
I said don’t ban yasuo tho...
It doesn't matter.

You're correct that it's run by an automated bot. But the results of that are that everyone is judged completely equally.

A single report does everything that 9 reports do. There is no benefit to mass reporting. There is no difference in outcome.

Asking for reports is flagged as negative. There is no reason to do so.

As for your analogy, yeah, knocking someone out for teasing you would indeed give you the "bad guy" label.
